item.title: Baby pterosaurs died in ancient storms—and their fossils reveal the truth
item.description: Two tiny pterosaurs, preserved for 150 million years, have revealed a surprising cause of death: violent storms. Researchers at the University of Leic...

item.title: The fat you can’t see may be damaging your heart, even if you exercise
item.description: Hidden fat wrapped around organs, known as visceral fat, has now been linked to faster heart aging. Using AI and imaging from more than 21,000 people ...
